portfolio.introduction: Welcome to my portfolio. I am a software engineer with experience in web development, IoT, and microservices.
portfolio.project_react: This project is built with React and supports a dark mode for a better user experience.
portfolio.project_iot: In this IoT project, I programmed home automation devices from scratch, focusing on IPv6.
portfolio.footer: Thank you for visiting my portfolio. Feel free to contact me for more information!
